players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and why. Bob, Charlie, what are your thoughts?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "I will remain silent. I don't want to give away my identity or any false information."
Charlie: "I am the detective and confirmed Bob is mafia. Vote Bob now to win."
You: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Bob has been silent and not defending himself. Let's vote Bob out."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
